琴.definition: guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither); musical instrument in general

琴劍飄零.definition: floating between zither and sword (idiom); fig. wandering aimlessly with no tenured position

琴書.definition: traditional art form, consisting of sung story telling with musical accompaniment

琴棋書畫.definition: (idiom) the four arts of the Chinese scholar (guqin, Go, calligraphy and painting); (by extension) the accomplishments of a well-educated person

琴瑟.definition: qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony; marital harmony

琴瑟不調.definition: out of tune; marital discord, cf qin and se 琴瑟, two string instruments as symbol of marital harmony

琴瑟和鳴.definition: in perfect harmony; in sync; lit. qin and se sing in harmony

琴酒.definition: gin (Taiwan variant of 金酒[jin1 jiu3])
